portfolio.title: Commercial project
portfolio.description: This is a calculator for a Google site, where information is collected from the client and sent to the manager's email. The projects are designed for all types of devices (html, sass). Written in pure JavaScript, the smtp.js library is used to send data by email. The projects are built using Gulp.

portfolio.title: Project in team. Twitter (step project)
portfolio.description: My part of work is: from markup to fetching data from the backend - search friends, recommended friends, bookmarks, change the theme; styled: posts, profile. Core Tools: React, Redux Toolkit, Axios. Form and Validation: Formik/Yup, prop-types.

portfolio.title: My project. Online store
portfolio.description: This is a small version of an online store where you can add products to your favorites, cart, and proceed to checkout. You can also create an order. To implement this project I used React, Redux, Formik/Yup, prop-types, Sass for styling components, snapshot testing for certain components

testimonial.description: Nastya was one of the first to respond to my job posting on the Weblancer website. She immediately warned me that she had little experience but assured me she could do what I needed. I trusted her. As a result, instead of one project, we completed two. She was easy to work with, always available, took my design preferences into account, addressed my comments about the calculator's functionality, and frequently suggested her own ideas on how to improve things from a user's perspective. I am very satisfied with our collaboration. Thanks to her for the cooperation.

Thank you for helping populate the product database. I know it's a monotonous task, but you handled it well. I would never have guessed it was your first time working with Shopify because you managed it quickly and, most importantly, with quality. Your diligence and willingness to learn will definitely help you in mastering this new profession. Good luck to you.
